targets.expr: sum by (status) (count_over_time({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` |  __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by(host) (count_over_time({job="nginx", filename="$host"}[$__interval]))

sum(rate({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | status >= 500 | __error__=""[$__interval])) / (sum(rate({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | __error__=""[$__interval])) / 100)

sum(rate({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | status = 403 | __error__=""[$__interval])) / (sum(rate({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | __error__=""[$__interval])) / 100)

sum by (host) (sum_over_time({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | status=200 | unwrap body_bytes_sent |  __error__="" [$__interval]))

quantile_over_time(0.95,{job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | unwrap request_time |  __error__=""  [$__interval]) by (host)
max by (host) (max_over_time({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | unwrap request_time |  __error__=""  [$__interval]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` |  __error__="" [$__interval]))

sum by (host) (sum_over_time({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | status=200 | unwrap body_bytes_sent |  __error__="" [$__interval]))
count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | __error__="" [1h])))
count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | __error__="" [1d])))
count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | __error__="" [2d])))
count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | __error__="" [7d])))
count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | __error__="" [1d])))

{job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | __error__=`` | line_format `request for {{.request_uri}} with HTTP status: {{.status}} from {{.remote_addr}}`
count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | __error__="" [30d])))
topk(5, sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | __error__="" [$__interval])))
topk(10, sum by (http_referer) (count_over_time({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | __error__="" [$__interval])))

panels.title: Top HTTP Referers - Exclude Panxora Site

targets.expr: topk(10,sum by (request_uri) (count_over_time({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | __error__="" [$__interval])))
topk(5, sum by (http_referer) (count_over_time({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | __error__="" [$__interval])))
topk(10, sum by (http_user_agent) (count_over_time({job="nginx", filename="$host"} | json | request_uri !~ `/grafana.*` | http_user_agent !~ `^Blackbox Exporter.*` | __error__="" [$__interval])))
